lessons.title: Lesson 0 - Introduction
lessons.desc: Get started with Pinyin, tones, and Chinese pronunciation.

lessons.title: Lesson 1 - Tones
lessons.desc: Learn the 4 tones of Mandarin with examples and practice audio.

lessons.title: Lesson 2 - Basic Greetings
lessons.desc: Learn greetings, introductions, and farewells in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 3 - Relationships
lessons.desc: Explore family and relationship words in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 4 - Pronouns
lessons.desc: Learn I, You, He, She, and They in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 5 - Numbers 0 to 10
lessons.desc: Master counting from 1 to 10 in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 6 - Yes / No Basics
lessons.desc: Understand how to say yes and no in conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 7 - Polite Phrases & Needs
lessons.desc: Say please, thank you, and express needs politely.

lessons.title: Lesson 8 - Days & Time
lessons.desc: Talk about days, weeks, and time in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 9 - Country & Introduction
lessons.desc: Learn to say where you’re from and your nationality.

lessons.title: Lesson 10 - Colors & Descriptions
lessons.desc: Learn colors in Mandarin and how to describe objects.

lessons.title: Lesson 11 - Foods & Drinks
lessons.desc: Learn common foods, drinks, and eating-related phrases in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 12 - Weather & Nature
lessons.desc: Learn weather terms, nature words, and environmental phrases.

lessons.title: Lesson 13 - Daily Activities
lessons.desc: Learn daily routine verbs and expressions in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 14 - At the Market
lessons.desc: Learn shopping phrases, fruits, vegetables, and bargaining words.

lessons.title: Lesson 15 - Clothes & Shopping
lessons.desc: Learn clothing items, shopping phrases, and sizes in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 16 - Transport & Directions
lessons.desc: Learn transport vocabulary and giving or following directions.

lessons.title: Lesson 17 - Review & Speaking
lessons.desc: Review lessons and practice speaking with real-life projects.

lessons.title: Lesson 18 - Describing People
lessons.desc: Learn how to describe people in Mandarin: appearance, age, and personality.

lessons.title: Lesson 19 - Feelings & Health
lessons.desc: Learn how to express feelings, emotions, and talk about health.

lessons.title: Lesson 20 - Question Words
lessons.desc: Learn basic question words to ask questions in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 21 - Numbers 11–100
lessons.desc: Learn numbers from 11 to 100 and how to use them in sentences.

lessons.title: Lesson 22 - House & Rooms
lessons.desc: Learn vocabulary related to houses, rooms, and furniture.

lessons.title: Lesson 23 - School & Learning
lessons.desc: Learn words related to school, studying, exams, and classroom objects.

lessons.title: Lesson 24 - Technology
lessons.desc: Learn vocabulary for technology, devices, internet, apps, and software.

lessons.title: Lesson 25 - Review & Speaking Project
lessons.desc: Review previous lessons and practice speaking with projects.
